creditline: Gift of Mrs. George P. Douglas
description: Text of the Tablet: 'This is Danvers Street begun in the year 1696 by Benjamin Stallwood'
markings: Inscription in pen and black ink in lower right corner reads: [Tablet on Street Corner for tail piece.]; Upper left corner in pen: [a6593]; upper right corner the number 19 is stamped in black ink. Verso: At center, the following: in black crayon [Cty a1513]; stamped in violet ink - [ ART DEPARTMENT, The Century Co., Union Square, NEW YORK CITY.]; Also the D - Douglas collector\'s mark upper left corner in pencil - OHL, lower right corner in pencil [33.231]
medium: Pen and black ink on Bristol board
title: Tablet on Street Corner for Tailpiece
